line_1: Did the sword of Conan mow
line_2: The crimson harvest of the foe.

line_1: 'Till arm'd by Care and taught to Mow,
line_2: Time draws the long destructive Blow;

line_1: We oft take up the Corn that you do mow;
line_2: What you would have of us we do not know:

line_1: Expects me near yon barley mow:
line_2: Love calls me hence; a fav'rite cow

line_1: A boy to help to tread the mow,
line_2: And drive, while t'other holds the plough;

line_1: And stands to gape at him upon the Mow:
line_2: For Anthony Meriah leaves her Cow,
